snippet: Traditionally, the identity of the final torchbearer is kept secret until the big moment arrives. But with a little history and a little logic, an educated guess can be made, even a few months beforehand.
abstract: Traditionally, the identity of the final torchbearer is kept secret until the big moment arrives. But with a little history and a little logic, an educated guess can be made, even a few months beforehand.

headline.main: Who Will Light the Caldron in London?
